Tanjur Narthang Bruno Lainé
1 N790 W22704bstod tshogs, ka13252bstod tshogs
1b1-6a3ff.1r-6r (pp.1-11) W2KG5015bstod tshogs, ka12KG212285bstod tshogs
1b1-6a3ff.1r-6r (pp.1-11) khyad par du 'phags pa'i bstod pa bi shaSh+Ta stA pa khyad par du 'phags pa'i bstod pa/ slob dpon mtho btsun grub rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarbA dz+nyA de bA dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de rin chen mchog gis bsgyur/ slad kyi ban+de dpal brtsegs rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
2 N791 W22704bstod tshogs, ka13252bstod tshogs
6a3-46a3ff.6r-46r (pp.11-91) W2KG5015bstod tshogs, ka12KG212285bstod tshogs
6a3-46a3ff.6r-46r (pp.11-91) khyad par du 'phags pa'i bstod pa'i rgya cher bshad pa bishe shasta ba nA ma TI kA khyad par du 'phags pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstod pa/ slob dpon mtho btsun grub rjes mdzad pa'i rgya cher bshad pa/ byang phyogs kyi rgyud du byung ba/ b+haM ga la'i yul gyis slob dpon shes rab go chas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta dzA ran+da na dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ yid srubs zla ba'i gtsug dang gos gser can/ rig byed byed po dga' byed grog mkhar pa/ rgyas pa rgyal dpog pa dang sa yi bu/ thub pa rkang mig phur bu lha min rjes/ skyob pa nyid mor byed pa'i rgyud 'khrungs pa/ srid gsum bla ma shAkya'I rgyal po de'i/ rnam par thar la bskrun min der bstod pa/ de yi 'grel pa de 'dir rdzogs par bas/ dge ba de yis srid pa'i ljongs rgyu pas/ bdag tu 'dzin pa'i thibs par 'khyams gyur pa/ mu stegs byed kyi mun pa 'joms byed pa'i/ rgyal ba nyin mor byed par bdag gyur cig / khyad par du 'phags par bstod pa'i rgya cher bshad pa/ slob dpon shes rab go chas mdzad pa las/ bar skabs su tshigs su bcad pa bcu gnyis kyi 'grel pa'i rgya dpe ma rnyed nas/ dus phyis shAkya'i dge slong kun dga' rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po zhes bya ba/ dpal sa skya'i dgon par sbyar pa rdzogs so
3 N792 W22704bstod tshogs, ka13252bstod tshogs
46a3-47a2ff.46r-47r (pp.91-93) W2KG5015bstod tshogs, ka12KG212285bstod tshogs
46a3-47a2ff.46r-47r (pp.91-93) thams cad mkhyen pa dbang phyug chen po'i bstod pa zhes bya ba sarba dz+nye ma hA sh+wa ra sto tra na ma tham cad mkhyen pa dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba'i bstod pa bram ze'i dge bsnyen mtho btsun grub rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dza ran+da na dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o
4 N793 W22704bstod tshogs, ka13252bstod tshogs
47a3-48b5ff.47r-48v (pp.93-96) W2KG5015bstod tshogs, ka12KG212285bstod tshogs
47a3-48b5ff.47r-48v (pp.93-96) lha las phul du byung bar bstod pa de wA ti sh+ya sto tra lha las phul du byung ba'i bstod pa / slob dpon bde byed bdag pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dz+nyA de wa dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban+de rin chen mchog gis bsgyur/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ban+de dpal rtsegs rak+Shi tas gtan la phab pa'o

48b5-67a2ff.48v-67r (pp.96-133) W2KG5015bstod tshogs, ka12KG212285bstod tshogs
48b5-67a2ff.48v-67r (pp.96-133) lha las phul du byung bar bstod pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa de wA ti shA ya sto tra TI kA lha las phul du byung bar bstod pa'i rgya cher bshad pa/ slob dpon shes rab go chas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzA ran+dA na'i zhal snga nas dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos sgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o
6 N795 W22704bstod tshogs, ka13252bstod tshogs
67a2-67b7ff.67r-68r (pp.133-135) W2KG5015bstod tshogs, ka12KG212285bstod tshogs
67a2-67b7ff.67r-68r (pp.133-135) sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa zhes bya ba bud d+ha s+ya sto tra nA ma 'phags ma nor rgyun pas mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa rdzogs so/ /rab tu bsngags pa'i gnas chen po bal po yam bu'i grong khyer du sgra'i mkhan po dpal rgyal ba'i snyan bzang po dang / shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos bsgyur pa'o//
7 N796 W22704bstod tshogs, ka13252bstod tshogs
68a1-68b6ff.68r-68v (pp.135-136) W2KG5015bstod tshogs, ka12KG212285bstod tshogs
68a1-68b6ff.68r-68v (pp.135-136) chos kyi sku la gnas pa'i yon tan thun mong ma yin pa la bstod pa
chos kyi sku la gnas pa'i yon tan thun mong ma yin pa la bstod pa/ slob dpon thogs med kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /shi len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa

68b6-69b5ff.68v-69v (pp.136-138) W2KG5015bstod tshogs, ka12KG212285bstod tshogs
68b6-69b5ff.68v-69v (pp.136-138) de kho na nyid la bstod pa ta t+wa sta ba de kho na nyid la bstod pa//shAkya'i dge slong dpal gyi go chas mdzad pa rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po many+dzu shri b+ha dra dang / dge slong shAkya 'od kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa

bdud btul ba la bstod pa/ rab dga'i lha'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so

70a3-74b3ff.70r-74v (pp.139-148) chos kyi dbyings su bstod pa d+harma d+hA tu sto tra chos kyi dbyings su bstod pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po kriSh+Na paN+Di ta dang / lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o

74b3-75b7ff.74v-75v (pp.148-150) dpe med par bstod pa ni rU ba ma sta ba dpe med par bstod pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po kriSh+Na paN+Di ta dang lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o

75b7-77a3ff.75v-77r (pp.150-153) 'jig rten las 'das par bstod pa lo kA tI ta sta ba 'jig rten las 'das par bstod pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po kriSh+Na paN+Di ta dang / lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gten la phab pa'o

77a4-77b2ff.77r-77v (pp.153-154) sems kyi rdo rje'i bstod pa cit+ta badzra sta ba sems kyi rdo rde'i bstod pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so

77b2-78a4ff.77v-78r (pp.154-155) don dam par bstod pa pa ra ma thA na sta ba don dam par bstod pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po kriSh+Na paN+Di ta dang lo tsA ba dgi slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

78b5-82b4ff.78v-82v (pp.156-164) sku gsum la bstod pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par 'grel pa kA ya tra ya sto tra nA ma s+ya bi ba ra nAma slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i sku gsum la bstod pa zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrad+d+ha ka ra warma dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba ban+de rin chen bzang pos gsar du bsgyur cing zhus pa lags so

82b4-83b5ff.82v-83v (pp.164-166) sems can mgu bar bya ba'i bstod pa sat+wA ra dA na sta ba sems can mgu bar bya ba'i bstod pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis tshigs su bcad pa'i sgo nas bsdus pa rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta chen po di paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gnas la phab pa'o

83b5-84b5ff.83v-84v (pp.166-168) shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bstod pa pra dz+nyA pA ra mi ta sto taM shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i bstod pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//kha che'i paN+Di ta thig le bum pa dang / lo tsA ba blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o

92b4-93b1ff.92v-93v (pp.184-186) dmyal ba nas 'don pa zhes bya ba na ra god+d+ha ri nA ma dmyal ba nas 'don pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'o/ /dpal ra sa ra mo che'i gtsug lag khang du grong khyer dpe med paN+Di ta ti la ka dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po shAkya'i dge slong pa tshab nyi ma grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

93b1-1101b7ff.93v-111v (pp.186-222) sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las bstod par mi nus par bstod pa zhes bya ba bar+Na ra ha ba ra Ne b+ha ga ba to bud d+ha sto tra ya shAkya sta ba nA ma sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa zhes bya ba slob dpon ma tri tsi Tas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarbA dz+nyA na de ba dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de dpal brtsegs rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ (110b) sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa zhes bya ba slob dpon ma tri tsi Tas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+ma ka ra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//(111b)

111b7-112a6ff.111v-112r (pp.222-223) dkon mchog gsum la bkra shis kyi bstod pa tri rat+na maM ga la sto tra dkon mchog gsum la bkra shis kyi bstod pa slob dpon ma ti tsi tras mdzad pa rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra sing ha pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de dpal brtsegs rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa

112a6-113a4ff.112r-113r (pp.223-225) yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan la bstod pa saM myak+saM bud+d+hA ya ka ta sto traM yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan la bstod pa/ snyan ngag mkhan chen po slob dpon ma ti tras mdzad pa rdzogs so

113a4-113b6ff.113r-113v (pp.225-226) gcig las 'phros pa'i bstod pa e kot+ta ri ka sto traM gcig las 'phros pa'i bstod pa//slob dpon ma te tsi tras mdzad pa rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shrI bad+d+ra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus pa

113b6-115b3ff.113v-115v (pp.226-230) bde bar gshegs pa sum cu rtsa lnga'i bstod pa mtshan rin po ches spras pa zhes bya ba su ga ta pany+tsa tri rat+na nA ma ma la sto traM bde bar gshegs pa sum cu tsa lnga'i bstod pa mtshan rin po ches spras pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ma ti tsi tras mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya garagyi mkhan po su ma ka ra warma dang / lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

122a1-128b4ff.122r-128v (243-256) brgya lnga bcu pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa sha ta pany+tsA sha ti ka nA ma s+ya sto tra brgya lnga bcu pa'i bstod pa slob dpon mkhas pa chen po bram ze rta dbyangs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI shrad+d+hA ka ra warma dang //lo tsA ba shAkya blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

317a5-320a5ff.317r-320r (pp.633-639) byung po 'dul byed kyi sgrub thabs yan lag dang bcas pa b+hu ta Da ma ra sA d+ha no pa yi ka zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal to/ mdor bsdus shing legs par rdzogs la rnam par gsal ba dang /rim pa legs par 'brel bas 'byung po 'dul byed kyi sgrub thabs yan lag dang bcas pa sems can mtha' dag bsgral bar byed pa'i don du 'jig rten gsum gyi rdo rjes mdzes par bsdebs pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta a b+ha ya la sogs pa'i zhal snga nas/ dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o

320a5-321a6ff.320r-321v (pp.639-642) mgon po nag po'i sgrub thabs mA hA kA la sA d+ha naM dpal dang ldan pa'i mgon po nag po'i sgrub thabs yongs su rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta a b+ha ya la sogs pa las dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o/ /snying po rtog mkhas dag gis 'gal med chos kyang 'gal bar rtog pa'i 'gro don bstan 'jug rim par bca' ba mdzad mod kyi/ bag yangs gyur dang theg mchog dus 'dir rgyus bzhos snying khu mchog dang mchog min dngos grub rnams ni sgrub byed sgrub pa'i thabs/ pa tshab tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur dge pa skyon bral des ni skye dgu chos mchog snod dang brtson ldan 'bral thob shog / dang por bdag sogs sgrib zad sngags mos sngags pa'i chos ldan skad thabs gang gis 'dul bas rtag tu chos ston gyur cig /mos pa'i khyad par gyis rgya gar na sgrub thabs bsdus pa 'ga' zhig srid na yang gzhung snyan dang gas dang ldan pas saM skr-i ta/ mchog tu gyur cing don bzang la gdams ngag che ba rnams bsdebs pa/ a b+ha ya kA ra'i phya dpe las paN+Di ta chen po de dag dang / pa tshab kyi rigs su skyes pa'i dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis sngon gyi khrims las ma 'das par bsgyur ba'i tshad du bsgyur ba'o

14a1-230b6ff. vol.89,ff.14r-230v (27-462) 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi 'grel pa pany+tsa bing+sha ti sa ha sri ka Ar+ya pardz+nyA pa ra mi to pa de shA b+hi sa ma yA laM kA ra shAstra s+ya br-it+ti shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi 'grel pa legs par spyad pa'i las can/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa/ 'phags pa mang pos bkur ba ku ru ku la'i sde pa gtsug lag khang rgya chen po du ma'i bdag po/ slob dpon sangs rgyas 'bangs kyi tsha bo/ shAkya'i dge slong 'phags pa rnam par grol ba'i sdes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /gang du dngos po dmigs pas dkrugs pa mang po bkur pa bzhin du 'khrul gyur pas/ shes rab pha rol phyin tshul gang zhig theg chen lam pa gzhan gyis ma gtogs pa/ des na 'phags pa gsal ba'i blo mnga' de yis rgyal la mngon sum 'di zhus nas/ grang don go rim ming dang dbye ba 'bras bu'i sgo nas 'di bshad ngo mtshar che/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po shar phyogs kyi dge bsnyen chen po dpal go mi 'chi med dang / lo tsA ba chen po shAkya'i dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur cing legs par gtan la phab pa'o//

1a1-87b7ff. vol.95,ff.1r-87v (pp.1-174) bcom ldan 'das yon tan rin po che sdud pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i dka' 'grel b+ha ga bA rat+na gu Na sany+tsa ya gA thA nA ma pany+tsi ka yon tan rin po che sdud pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i dka' 'grel rtogs par sla ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po seng ge bzang po'i zhal nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bal yul gyi paN+Di ta dze ta ha du shan+ti b+ha dra'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba 'bro seng dkar shAkya'i 'od kyis bsgyur/ blo ngan tshong pa nor bu 'ching bu la/ rin chen rin thang med snyam 'chang ba ltar/ dam pa brgyud pa'i gdams ngag dang bral ba/ ngan rtog rgyud la rgyal yum don yin par/ log rtog bsal phyir sa bdag mam kyi mchog /bzhon nu rab gshegs thos pa'i shes rab byang / de don gtan phab sems pa'i shes rab chung / bsgom pa'i rgyun bsten tshul khrims gtong ba'i 'od/ rin chen dang bcas rje btsun bkas bskul nas/ bzhin gyis skyon yon gsal byed me long ltar/ seng ge bzang po'o man ngag rtogs sla ba/ 'bad pas bal yul bgrod nas bdag gi bsgyur/ gal te kha cig 'di la'ang phrag dog gos spong na/ gzhan la gnod med bdag nyid kho na phung byed yin/ ji ltar rus skam dung pa khyi rgan gyis 'chos pas/ rkan phug rang khrag 'jib cing rus pa'i ro snyam sems/ rang rtags ngan rtog gzhung la chags pa'ang de bzhin no/ dus gsum kun tu mi 'gyur nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ chos nyid skyon med pha rol phyin pa 'di nyid lags/ de thos de la ma dad log bltas bdag tu 'dzin/ na so chod dang ldan yang byis par 'dren pas gsungs/ 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che rgyas par byed nas par gyur cig

3165 N4008 W22704mdo 'grel, ma1043355mdo 'grel
317a1-328b7 W2KG5015mdo 'grel, ma1042KG212388mdo 'grel
317a1-328b7 bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i 'grel pa don gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba b+ha ga ba ti pra dz+nyA pA ra mi tA hr-i da ya ar+tha pra dI pa nA ma TI kA bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i 'grel pa don gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ bal yul ye rang gi grong khyer du rje btsun bla ma dam pa phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar bod kyi dge ba'i gshes gnyen rnams kyis chos zhus pa'i dus su/ bla ma dam pas chos ston pham babs gnang ba'i nyen bar bod kyi dge ba'i bshes rnams kyis mdo bton pa la/ bla ma dam pas lo tsA ba la khong 'don pa de ci yin gsungs pas/ lo tsA bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po lags zhus pas/ 'o na bod du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po dar na sangs rgyas kyis lung bstan pa de bden pa yin no/ snying po'i don gyi gdams ngag shes sam gsungs pa la/ skye mang bde chen bud ba smyon pa'o/ ba la su zhag mnyan du yang / gal te smyan pa'i chag la bden pa yang srad thugs la dgongs nas su/ mthun pa'i grags pa rnams kyis ma bden na yang don 'di dgongs par zhu/ gal te stod pa thabs yin na/ de tsho lo tsA bas ma 'tshal zhes lan btab pa la/ 'o na ngas khyed rnams la gdams ngag bstan gyis gsungs nas/ snying po'i don gyis gdams ngag gnang ba zin ris bris nas nan tan bya pa yin no/ bla ma dam pa'i zhabs kyi pad ma'i sbrang rtsi smyo chu 'thungs nas su/ skye med bde chen bung ba smyon pa'i kha la su zhig mnyan du yod/ gal te smyon pa'i tshig la bden pa yod srid thugs la dgongs nas su/ mthun pa'i grogs po rnams kyi mi bden na yang don 'di dgongs par zhu/ gal te stong pa thabs yin na/ de tshe sangs rgyas nyid mi 'gyur/ rgyu las 'bras bu gzhan med phyir/ thabs ni stong pa nyid ma yin/ lta ba rnams las legs rnams dang / bdag tu lta ba tshol rnams kyi/ bdag tu 'dzin pa bzlog pa'i phyir/ rgyal ba rnams kyi stong pa bstan/ srid zhi mnyam nyid dus gsum rgyal ba'i yum/ 'gro ba'i bde sgrub thabs mkhas ston par byed/ gzhung gi bdag nyid rin chen lta bu la/ dad dang gus pas yang yang phyag 'tshal lo/ phan sems spro dgas bris pa'i 'grel pa 'di/ gang zag dam pa rnams kyi phyag tu brgyud pa dang / bstan pa'i bya ba mdzod pa bdag gi smon lam yin/ chos nyid bden pas de ltar grub gyur cig

nas/ ston pa gangs can 'di na kho bo tsam
